SEARCH
Package model.simulation

Class Simulator

java.lang.Object
model.simulation.Simulator
public class Simulator extends Object
Simulator manages the execution of the simulation, including initializing, running, and finalizing the simulation. It handles the scheduling and processing of events, and interacts with the simulation controller and data access objects.

      Parameters:
      simulationController - the controller managing the simulation

      countries - the list of countries in the simulation
